translations: 对抗；抵消；补偿；与……势均力敌（countervail 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Their strategy is expansionist and imperialist, and it is greatest in effect, of course, when there is no countervailing power.
sentences.translation: 他们的战略是扩张主义的和帝国主义的，当然，它在没有抗衡力量的时候就会达到最大效果。

sentences.sentence: Two countervailing factors, it is argued, will tend to support the dollar.
sentences.translation: 据认为，有两个抵消因素将支撑美元的地位。
